title: I Think I Am In Friend-Love With You
description: YALSA Quick Pick Award WinnerExpress your love for your friends with this sweet, loving book that celebrates the joy of true friendship.I have a confession to make.I think I am in friend-love with you.What’s friend-love? It’s that super-awesome bond you share with someone who makes you happy every time you text each other, or meet up for an epic outing. It’s not love-love. You don’t want to swap saliva; you want to swap favorite books. But it’s just as intense and just as amazing.And it’s this search for that connection that comic-book artist Yumi Sakugawa captures in I Think I Am in Friend-Love with You . It’s perfect if you've ever fallen in friend-love and want to show that person how much you love them...in a platonic way, of course.
author: Yumi Sakugawa
